content.raw:
I have fixed some bugs in the contact sensor, so that it now respects the update rate and topic name specified in the sdf. I've also added time to the messages, which should help with debugging. I just created [pull request 137](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/137) to prevent repeat messages after losing contact with an object. With this change, the sensor will send no messages when not in contact with an object.

I wasn't fully able to reproduce the errors you refer to because I think you are using a modified model of the DRC robot. If you provide a copy of your model (and any contact sensor plugins if you are using those), I will test it against this updated code.
content.html:
I have fixed some bugs in the contact sensor, so that it now respects the update rate and topic name specified in the sdf. I've also added time to the messages, which should help with debugging. I just created pull request 137 to prevent repeat messages after losing contact with an object. With this change, the sensor will send no messages when not in contact with an object.

I wasn't fully able to reproduce the errors you refer to because I think you are using a modified model of the DRC robot. If you provide a copy of your model (and any contact sensor plugins if you are using those), I will test it against this updated code.
